definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: Le Figaro newspaper called the film "faultless".
sentences.chinese: 费加罗报称赞这部电影“完美无瑕”。

sentences.english: Create prefect and flawless fix effect.
sentences.chinese: 为你塑造完美无瑕的定妆效果。

sentences.english: I scowled at his perfect face.
sentences.chinese: 我阴沉着脸，瞪着他完美无瑕的面庞。

sentences.english: For now, bide your time and make sure your work is flawless.
sentences.chinese: 现在静静的守候同时确保你的工作完美无瑕。

sentences.english: Nature is not perfect and variation within organization leads to greater interest.
sentences.chinese: 大自然并非完美无瑕，自然组织中的差异性更加有趣。

sentences.english: But when everything is all perfect, all the time, it seems like an act.
sentences.chinese: 但是当时时刻刻一切皆完美无瑕，就像是演戏了。

sentences.english: Feyweave armor is woven with techniques perfected by the eladrin.
sentences.chinese: 精织护甲是用雅灵完美无瑕的技术织成。
上帝是一个完美无瑕的父亲。

sentences.english: Customer Support? You won't need that. Our programs are flawless.
sentences.chinese: 顾客支援？你不须要此。我们的程式完美无瑕疵。

sentences.english: called Flawless and also Diversity, I think they're called.
sentences.chinese: 他们被称作完美无瑕和多元化，我想是这样的名字。

sentences.english: The first throw quad salchow Shen Xue and Zhao Hongbo attempted was flawless.
sentences.chinese: 申雪和越宏博试作的和一个四周抛跳完美无瑕。

definition: perfect and without blemish/flawless/to leave nothing to be desired
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
pure and limpid/(of a person) quick-witted
